text:
The scp task does not at present support copying from a remote server to a
remove server. However, this limitation is not documented in the Ant manual. The
task's quiet failure is annoying as one of the major use cases of the Unix scp
program is to perform so-called "third-party" copying, from one remote server to
another remote server.
